use_condition.description: Whether the extension can be used by a pipeline or template. Options, pipeline or template.

input_repo_type.description: Source code repository type, CodeArts Repo, GitLab, or GitHub.

input_source_type.description: Whether a pipeline has one source or multiple sources.

plugin_name.description: plugin unique identifier, must be retrieved by using tool queryExtensionsList, if not wrong indentifier might be used and wrong answer will output

plugin_attribution.description: Extension attribute. The value can be custom or official.  must be retrieved by using tool queryExtensionsList

version_attribution.description: Version attribute. The value can be draft or formal. A

is_publish.description: Whether it is a release pipeline

items.description: Describes the source of the pipeline, e.g., a code repository.

branches.description: Branches to include in the trigger

exclude_branches.description: Branches to exclude from the trigger

tags.description: Tags to include in the trigger (for tag_push events)

exclude_tags.description: Tags to exclude from the trigger (for tag_push events)

paths.description: File paths to include in the trigger

exclude_paths.description: File paths to exclude from the trigger

create.description: Whether to trigger on merge request creation (for merge_request events)

merge.description: Whether to trigger on merge (for merge_request events)

update.description: Whether to trigger on merge request update (for merge_request events)

code_update.description: Whether to trigger on code update (for merge_request events)

reopen.description: Whether to trigger on merge request reopen (for merge_request events)

git_type.description: Type of git repository (e.g., codehub, github, gitlab)

endpoint_id.description: Endpoint ID for the git repository

is_auto_comment.description: Whether to automatically comment on pull requests

manifest_version.description: Pipeline structure definition version, new version defaults to 3.0

definition.description: Pipeline structure definition, a stringified json

body.description: Template create pipeline request body parameters

is_publish.description: Whether it is a release pipeline

items.description: Describes the source of the pipeline, e.g., a code repository.

tools.name: ListPipelines
tools.description: List pipelines/Get project pipeline execution status

is_publish.description: Whether it is a change pipeline

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project.
The unique identifier of the project.

tracker_id.description: Work item type. The options are as follows: 2: task; 3: defect /Bug,5Epic,6Feature,7Story. The value 5 can only be the parent work item type of 6. 6 can only be the parent work item type of 7. The value 7 can only be the parent of 2 or 3.

tools.name: listWorkItems
tools.description: List work items of a project by creation time.

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project.
The unique identifier of the project.

issue_id.description: The unique identifier of the work item.

tools.name: listProjectRepositories
tools.description: List all repositories in a project, can add search query with the name of the repo
